description:
-Displays data from the phone's GPS unit.
-Copy the GPS data to the clipboard & paste it in another app.
-Record the GPS data and email it or upload it to Google Docs in CSV or GPX format.

v1.3.3:
- Upgraded from Google Docs API to Google Drive API.
- Updated to support changes to Google authorization.

v1.3.2:
- Updated for the Pre3.

v1.3.1:
- Added option to allow velocity to use a different unit system from the other data.
- Updated Help screen to reflect new features in SimpleGPS Pro

v1.3.0:
- Added 'Record' button to main screen.
- Added a recording status indicator (red dot) to the upper right of corner of most screens.
- Added option to upload/email recorded data in GPX format.
- Added option to automatically start tracking when the app launches.
- Changed Google account authorization to a more secure system. You will need re-enter your credentials for uploading to work.
- Changed the Error Log to be persistent, but limited to the last 100 entries.
- Unified the code base with the new SimpleGPS Pro app.
